loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana es de la ciudad de Encarnación, está casada, trabaja con sus padre como secretaria, actualmente está en el 4to año de la carrera de enfermería en la universidad, su principal objetivo es terminar su carrera y trabajar en su profesión.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Liliana is from the city of Encarnación. She is married and works with her father as a secretary. She is currently in her fourth year of nursing studies in university. Her main goal is to finish her education and work in her field.

She asks for this loan so that she can cover her tuition costs, so that she can continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay her tuition costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her tuition.

loans.name: Anania

texts.es:
El Sr. Anania es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora, que está luchando para poder salir adelante, e ir mejorando  su vida por medio de su trabajo.
Comenta que es de profesión bicicletero, gomero, también cuenta con una despensa en su casa en la que su señora es la encargada, tiene hijos, pero todos ya mayores.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de repuestos para bicicletas, como también de insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
Mr. Anania is from the city of San Ignacio. He is a very hard-working and enterprising person, who is fighting to be able to go forward and to continue improving his life through his work.

He says that he works with bicycles and rubber, and he also has a store in his house, which his wife manages. He has children, but all of them are older.

He asks for this loan to buy spare parts for bicycles and to buy supplies to continue with his sales.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for bicycles and supplies for his store.

loans.name: Vanancio

texts.en:
Vanancio is a 35-year old married man with seven children who are 14, 12, 10, 8, 6, 4 and 2 years old. He lives in a rural setting with his family. Four of his children are still attending primary school. He is a businessman who deals in trading of silver fish. He works six days a week, eight hours a day.

Vanancio supplements his family income with agriculture, where he grows banana plantations. He started the business of selling silver fish with the aim of increasing family income since his agriculture business was not going well.

He sells his fish to the local people around. His hope is to buy more land so that he can start fish ponds, but he still has a challenge of depleting fish volumes. He describes himself as an honest and hardworking man. The previous loan helped him to increase his sales and profit.

loans.use: To buy fish to sell

loans.name: Twisungane Group

texts.en: Beatrice is a group leader who is 45 years old. She is married with 5 children who are between the ages of 7 and 21 years old. The group is called Twisungane, which means “Altogether” in English. They sell different items and they have common goals for changing their life through loans. With the loan, Beatrice would like to buy more bananas and cassava to resell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more bananas and cassava to resell.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 48 years old. She is married with 8 children aged between 6 and 20 years old. Six of the children go to school. She sells foodstuffs and has been doing this for 10 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more cassava, sorghum and bananas to resell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more cassava, sorghum and bananas to resell.

loans.name: Jean Baptiste

texts.en: Jean Baptiste is 30 years old and married with 3 children who are between 2 and 8 years old. Two of the children go to school. He sells shop and he has been in the business for 6 years. With the loan, he would like to buy more sorghum, rice and sugar to resell. The profits from the business will be used to build his house.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum, rice and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Seraphine

texts.en: Seraphine is 44 years old and married with 6 children who are between 8 and 16 years old. All of the children go to school. She has been selling clothes for 20 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes to resell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to resell.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.en: Jorge sells milk and his wife attends a candy stand. Jorge has been married for 20 years and he has four children. Jorge has his own house. The house doesn't have sewerage. Jorge needs a loan to buy a milking cow. He is doing a good job so he needs more cows to sell more milk. Jorge is still living in Achacachi.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en: Sonia is 33 years old and lives with her son and parents-in-law. Sonia sells skirts. She attends her store very early in the morning. Since the carnival is coming, Sonia needs a loan to buy cloth to make skirts used in costumes. Sonia wants to have her own house in the future; that is why she is making all the sacrifices she can at her store. She hopes you can help her.

loans.use: to buy cloth

loans.name: Nestor

texts.en: Nestor is married and has three kids. Nestor is still living in El Alto. Nestor is still working for a construction company. He has his own house. His wife is still working in a tannery business.  Nestor needs a loan to fix his tools. He hopes you can help him.

loans.use: to fix his tools

loans.name: Tomas

texts.en: Tomas is a carpenter and he has his own house. He is the father of five kids, all of whom go to school. Tomas is married and his wife is a seamstress. Tomas needs a loan to buy wood. The school will start soon. That means that Tomas will have a lot of expenses for his family, so he needs your help to have more money for his family.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a 48-year-old married man who has five children. He lives in a rural area with his family and only two of his children attend school. He is a businessman who deals in produce trading, where he sells coffee, beans and maize.

He has been in this business since 1997 and he works six days a week, 12 hours each day. He started this business due to the experience he had, since his farmer was a produce trader and started to help him at a tender age. He has requested this loan in order to stock more corn and millet. His customers are traders from the city.

He hopes to expand this business but he still faces the challenge of unstable price fluctuations and lack of enough capital. He describes himself as a hardworking man and argues lenders to reduce interest rates.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en: Jose is a single man who lives with his mother and his brother. Jose works as a mason and a farmer. He makes cheese and sells milk. Jose needs a loan to buy a milking cow. Jose loves his family a lot, but he wants to have his own place and his own land in the future. Nevertheless, he will be taking care of his family. He hopes you can help him.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow

loans.name: Muong Phang 18 Group

texts.en: Mrs. Nui is a 46-year-old Thai lady who lives with her husband, along with her adult children and her nephew in an old Thai traditional house in a remote village. She has worked very hard at agricultural production, such as cultivating rice, raising pigs, buffalo, chickens, cows and fish to support her crowded family. To have enough capital to increase production, she has taken out a loan from the Anh Chi Em program. This is the second time she has received a loan from the program and will use it to buy young fish and expand fish farming. She hopes her investment will go prosperously and help her improve income for the family, then gradually improve their living conditions. In the picture, she stands at the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy young fish and expand fish farming

loans.name: San Jorge Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Jorge es un grupo nuevo que tiene le esperanza de poder mejorar sus vidas, todo esto gracias al trabajo en equipo que hacen. Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Claudelina, quien se dedica a la venta de lencerías que vende de manera ambulante.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora comenta que al principio le fue un poco difícil, pero después poco ha poco se ha ido formando una muy buena clientela.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de lencerías varias, para que de esa forma pueda seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
The group called San Jorge is a new group that has the hope to be able to improve their lives, all of this thanks to their teamwork.  One of the members is Claudelina who works as a street vendor selling lingerie.

She is a very hard-working person who says that at first it was a bit difficult, but little by little she has been forming a very good customer base.  She is asking for this loan in order to buy assorted lingerie so that in this manner she can continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en: Mario is 30 years old, married and has three children. Mario is a farmer and a schoolteacher. Mario has his own house. Mario sells milk and makes cheese. Mario needs a loan to buy a milking cow. Mario and his family are healthy. He hopes you can help him because he works hard and likes his family a lot.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow

loans.name: Rashida

texts.en: Rashida is married with three children, all of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She has a restaurant business which she has been involved in for eight years. She has applied for a loan of 800,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy bunches of green bananas, beef, rice, chicken and beans. She works at the market six days a week, and sells on a retail basis only. Her major business challenges include seasonality and thieves. Rashida aspires to buy a fridge so as to sell cold drinks. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy bunches of green bananas, beef, rice, chicken and beans.

loans.name: Norah

texts.en:
Norah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with six children, all of whom go to school. She takes care of additional members. She sells charcoal at the market on a retail and wholesale basis. She has been in this business for the last 15 years. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 1,800,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. She gets additional income from rental houses. 

Her major challenge includes seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a van for transporting charcoal from the village to the market for sale. She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with six children, two of whom go to school. She takes care of one additional family member. Aisha operates a beauty salon. She operates her business on a retail basis and works six days a week. Aisha has been in this business for the last 11 years. She also gets additional income from tailoring. 

She has requested a loan of 1,100,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy braids, weaves, relaxers, treatments, rollers, and shampoo. Her major challenges include seasonality and electricity. Her goal and aspiration is to buy more chairs and dryers for her salon.  She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and food.

loans.use: to buy braids, weaves, relaxers, treatments, rollers, and shampoo.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is a single mother of four children, all of whom go to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She sells used clothes and has been in this business for seven years. She has applied for a loan of 800,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy bales of used clothes. She sells from door to door and sells to all categories of people on a retail basis six days a week. Her major business challenges include the rainy season, which hinders her movements, and transportation. She is hoping to get a permanent business location and also to build a house. She resides now in a rented house where the family has access to electricity and does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy bales of used clothes

loans.name: Jorgelina

texts.es:
Jorgelina es de la ciudad de Pilar, ella es dueña de una mercería y venta de joyas, ella es soltera, tiene un hijo ya mayor, que con mucho esfuerzo pudo sacar adelante.
Es una persona  muy trabajadora y emprendedora y con buenas referencias, está esforzándose para poder seguir creciendo como lo viene haciendo.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de artículos varios de mercería y joyas variadas para la venta.
texts.en:
Jorgelina lives in the city of Pilar. She is single, the mother of an adult child, and earns a living selling clothing and jewelry. She has worked extremely hard and managed to improve her life. 

Jorgelina is a very industrious and entrepreneurial woman, with good references. She's concentrating on building her business so it can continue to grow. She is applying for a loan for the purchase of various clothing and jewelry items to sell.

loans.use: to purchase various clothing and jewelry items to sell.

loans.name: Muong Phang 19 Group

texts.en: Mrs. Pang, 30, is married and has two daughters who are 10 and 13 years old and attend school fully. They live happily in an old small Thai traditional house and work at agricultural production for a living, which includes cultivating rice, breeding pigs, fish, chickens and cows. Mrs. Pang and her husband are hardworking farmers and they have made a great effort to increase production by expanding their activities. Indeed, this is the fourth time Mrs. Pang has received a loan from the Anh Chi Em program and she will use it to buy young fish and expand fish farming. She hopes her investment will go smoothly and help to improve earnings for her family. She dreams her children will be successful in their career and escape from poverty. In the picture, she stands at the first from the right.

loans.use: to buy young fish and expand fish farming

loans.name: Nady

texts.en:
Nady is 43 years old and from Baniswef. He is married to a housewife and has four schoolchildren. He is a part-time farmer, but his income is not constant and can't cover his family's monthly expenses.

So, he decided to start a project that guarantees him a constant income and does not require exhausting physical effort. He started a small fattening project with a 5,000 EGP loan from TADE and successfully repaid it on the due date.

He requested another 5,000 EGP loan to buy another head of cattle to expand his project and increase his family’s income.

loans.use: to buy a head of cattle to expand his project and increase his family's income.

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.en:
Clemencia works hard to support her family. Clemencia is married and has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Clemencia has been in this business for 3 years now.

In the future, Clemencia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es:
El Sr. Aurelio está casado, vive en la Ciudad de Curuguaty, es una persona muy trabajadora, comenta que tiene un taxi, realiza viajes de por la ciudad de Curuguaty y también por las distintas compañías.
A través del préstamo de la kiva quiere reparar su Vehículo y volver a trabajar para satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes y salir adelante con su familia., para poder darle todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna.
texts.en:
Señor Aurelio lives in the city of Curuguaty. He is married, and a very hardworking taxi driver who drives passengers around the city and the surrounding area. 

He is applying for a loan so that he can pay for repairs to his taxi. With these repairs Señor Aurelio will be able to meet the needs of his customers and provide for his family, giving them what they need for a decent life.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to his taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds and crops

loans.name: Ritah

texts.en: Ritah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children, all of whom go to school. She has no additional members. She operates a kiosk selling cold drinks at the market at retail. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 600,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy boxes of mineral water, crates of soda and fruits to make juice. Her major challenges include seasonality, transportation, and electricity shortages. Her goals and aspirations are to educate her children through school and to buy a plot of land. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy boxes of mineral water, crates of soda and fruits to make juice

loans.name: Damas Independientes Group

texts.es:
Damas independiente se llama este grupo, se formo en ciudad del este, son mujeres jefas de familia que están luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de pobreza, están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder lograrlo.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que esta en un nivel extremo de pobreza. Ella se dedica a la  venta de verduras, tiene todo tipo de verduras frescas los cuales vende de manera ambulante, y con los ingresos que obtiene ayuda a su familia.
Hoy pide este préstamo para poder comprar verduras frescas, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo de ventas, y poder ir mejorando de esa forma sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Damas Independientes is the name of this group.  It was formed in Ciudad del Este.  They are female heads of household who are struggling to improve their conditions of poverty.  They are taking the survey about the elimination of poverty in order to be able achieve it.
One of the members is Maria, who in her survey demonstrated a level of poverty in the first level, which means that she is in an extreme level of poverty.  She makes a living selling vegetables.  She has all kinds of fresh vegetables which she sells Itinerantly, and with the proceeds she obtains, she helps her family.
Today she is requesting this loan in order to be able to buy fresh vegetables, and in this way be able to continue her sales work and to be able to improve in this way her life conditions.

loans.use: to buy fresh vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 21 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace 3 años a la venta de ropa interior al por mayor, ya tiene clientes fijo que lo prefieren por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para poder  continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
The youth has a pixelated face as he is 21 years old and lives in a high risk zone. He has worked for three years selling wholesale underwear. He already has fixed customers that prefer the quality of his products as well as the good prices. The youth lives in his own house with his wife and son.

He is asking for a loan to purchase more wholesale goods in order to be able to continue selling and therefore earn more.

loans.use: to purchase underwear at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de refrescos, su negocio lo tiene ubicado frente al centro de salud que se encuentra cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con su madre, su hermano, su cuñado y su hijo, y está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de jugos, gaseosas, agua, hielo y todo lo necesario para su venta, ya que le ha ido muy bien en su negocio y asi podrá tener mejores ingresos para  una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The young woman, whose face has been pixelated because she is twenty-six years old and lives in a high risk zone, makes a living selling drinks.  Her business is located in front of the health center which is near her house.  With what she obtains from her sales, she is able to cover her household expenses.  The young woman lives in her own house with her mother, her brother, her brother-in-law, and her son.
She is once again requesting a loan in order to buy juices, soft drinks, water, ice, and everything necessary for her sales since things have been going well with her business and in this way she will be able to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy juices, soft drinks, water, ice, and all that is necessary for her business.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel es divorciado y vive en Achacahi, Miguel tiene casa propia la cual es de adobe y ladrillo pero cuenta con servicios de luz, agua y alcantarillado Miguel es rentista ya que se jubilo del oficio de la ensenañza en colegios Miguel quiere un credito para hacer refacciones en su hogar, sucede que las lluvias han dañado seriamente la estructura asi es que Miguel necesita comprar materiales de construccion y pagar a los albañiles En la foto Miguel aparece en el jardin de su casa Miguel no tiene hijos a quien acudir por eso espera que le ayuden
texts.en: Miguel is divorced and lives in Achacahi. Miguel has his own house which is made of adobe and brick, and has electricity, water, and plumbing. Miguel receives a retirement pension since he retired from teaching high school. Miguel wants a loan to do renovations at home; the rains have severely damaged the structure of his house. Miguel need to purchase building materials and pay construction workers. In the photo, Miguel is in his garden. Miguel has no children to help him, so he hopes he can count on this loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and pay construction workers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy ingredients to make traditional meals to sell

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel tiene 44 años de edad, vive en casa familiar, ella es madre soltera vive con sus dos hijos de edades 19 y 15 años de los cuales el segundo cursa secundaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pucará. Cliente vive en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Maribel es la venta de ataúdes, trabaja con la municipalidad de Pucará y la Posta Médica, ella cuenta con 25 años de experiencia en el rubro, las compras lo realiza en Jaén y la venta en Pucará. Además se dedica a brindar servicios de costura así como también lavado de ropa; ingresos adicionales que le permiten solventar el crédito sin ningún problema. El destino del crédito será para invertir en su negocio surtiendo con nuevos modelos de ataúdes que hay en el mercado con ello le generará mejores ingresos, mayores ganancias y de esta forma podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maribel, 44, lives in the family home.  She's a single mother and lives with her two children, 19 and 15.  The second one is in secondary school in the national school in the district of Pucará.  She lives in the rural part of Pucará in the province of Jaén in the Catamarca region of the northern highlands of Peru.

Maribel's job is selling coffins.  She works with the town of Pucará and the clinic, and she has 25 years of experience in the field.  She makes her purchases in Jaén and Pucará.  She also offers sewing services and washes clothes in her home, additional income that allows her to pay back loans without any problems.

The loan will be to invest in her business with a supply of new models of coffins that are on the market.  This will earn more income and greater profits for her, and she'll be able to improve her quality of life and that of her children.

loans.use: to supply her business with new models of coffins that are on the market

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam is a Kubo Financiero's client and this is her story:

Miriam is 21 years old, lives in a common-law marriage, and is the mother of a 2-year-old girl. She has been making a living by being involved in commercial enterprises for 5 years now. She started by selling footwear and quilts; after this experience, she decided to study for a technical career and took a beauty course. She opened her beauty salon 3 years ago.

In her salon, Miriam provides aesthetic services for men, women and children and also can provide special services for weddings, quinceañeras and other special events. Additionally she applies detachable eyelashes and does eyebrow ironing, manicures and pedicures. 

She asks for this loan in order to invest it in her business, specifically to stock up on merchandise needed for the many different treatments she offers.

loans.use: to stock up her beauty salon

loans.name: Aracely Petrona

texts.es:
Aracely  es una mujer casada de 20 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Solola, al lado de su esposo y su hijo de 5 años. 

Aracely es una persona que le gusta trabajar, ella es maestra de educación primaria trabaja en una escuela de su comunidad, pues este trabajo ella lo desempeña solo por medio día, pues para aprovechar culminar el día ella y como trabajos de fines de semana, tomo la iniciativa de buscarse otra actividad que le permita estar al lado de su hijo, pues ella se dedica desde hace cuatro años a la elaboración de blusas que es muy usada por  su comunidad y algunos lugares circunvecinos.

Aracely para realizar este trabajo necesita de capital de trabajo, porque ella tiene que comprar diversidad de telas e hilos como materia prima para elaborar las blusas, ella decidió  buscar un préstamo para comprar suficiente material, ella por el tipo de blusas que realiza es muy buscada pero no puede satisfacer a toda su clientela, ya que no cuenta con suficiente materia prima, la expectativa de Aracely es conseguir el préstamo en tan corto tiempo. 
Con las ganancias ella más adelante pueda ayudar al esposo a construir una casa para su  familia.
texts.en:
Aracely is a 20 year old married woman and lives in the Solola community, together with her husband and 5 year old son.

Aracely is a person that likes to work. She is a primary education teacher and works in a school in her community. Since she does this job only for half a day, in order to take advantage of the rest of the day and as a weekend job, she took the initiative to look for another activity that allows her to be next to her son. For four years now she is making a living in the creation of blouses that are used a lot in her community and some places in the vicinity.

Aracely, to perform this job, needs working capital, because she needs to buy a diversity of fabrics and threads as input materials to create the blouses. She decided to look for a loan to buy sufficient materials. Because of the type of blouses she makes, she is very well sought after, but she cannot satisfy all her clients as she does not have enough input materials. 
Aracely hopes to get a loan within a short time frame. With the profits, in the future she will be able to help her husband build a house for their family.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and threads

loans.name: Yaisa

texts.en:
Yaisa is a client of Kubo Financiero, she is thirty-seven years old and single. 

She was originally born in Colombia but has now been living in Mexico for some years. Yaisa is an engineer specialized in quality control and currently works in a commerce chamber as the special projects manager. 

She is starting her own company: a quality control company for mexican companies that export products; she offers certification, consulting and training for companies interested. This is the reason she asks for this loan. Although she received government help to develop the company, which aims to better the quality of Mexican exports, recent expenses have come up and she asks for this money to continue the development of the company.

loans.use: to continue financing the consulting and certification company she is starting

loans.name: Sergio

texts.en:
Sergio got his start in the janitorial industry more than twelve years ago. After working as an employee for many years, he decided he wanted to be his own boss to support his family. It was then that he decided to start his own janitorial business.

A family-owned and operated business, his wife and son help him with the business. What sets them apart is that they provide high-quality services, guaranteed at an accessible price. He gets most of his clients through recommendations from his many satisfied customers. He loves that his business has allowed him to meet new people, have new experiences and grow his networks.

Sergio is looking to grow and go after other accounts, but needs to upgrade his equipment to accommodate the requests of his current clients as well as other future clients. Sergio is requesting a Kiva loan to invest in new equipment and in other cleaning supplies to increase clientele. He also would like to upgrade to newer "green" vacuums, filters and cleaning supplies to accommodate his clients.

His dreams are for his business to grow and to own his own home one day. He would also like to promote two of his part-time employees to full-time.

He is so thankful to Kiva lenders for helping him live his dream of being an independent business owner and supporting his family.

loans.use: to invest in new equipment and in other cleaning supplies to increase clientele.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase basic construction materials to build a wall.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia de material noble en el caserío de Laynas, ubicado en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. Es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio y cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz.

El se dedica a la venta de animales menores, actividad que realiza desde hace más de 03 años, contando con clientela fija en la zona. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales, así como para realizar reparaciones en el lugar donde los cría. Con esto Eduardo espera mejorar la productividad de su negocio y ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes, satisfaciendo sus gustos y necesidades, lo que le generará un mayor nivel de ingresos y le permitirá aumentar su calida de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Eduardo, 40, is in a common-law relationship.  He lives in his own house built of quality materials located in the La Matanza district of the province of Morropón in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.  The residents of the area work in agriculture, ranching, and commerce.  He has basic services such as water and electricity.

He earns a living selling small animals, work he has been doing for more than three years.  He has steady customers in the area and very good personal and business references.

The current loan will be used to buy balanced feed for his animals and to make repairs on the place he raises them.

Eduardo hopes this will improve the productivity of his business and offer his customers a better product, thus satisfying their tastes and needs.  This will earn more income for him and allow him to improve his quality of life and his family's.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his animals and to make repairs to the place he raises them

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto tiene 40 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su madre en el distrito de Pomahuaca, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. En dicho distrito sus actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, es un distrito mediano con aspiraciones a superarse.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de arroz de variedad capirona en buen estado, cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de arroz, con esto Gilberto espera mejorar su producción ofreciendo un producto de mayor calidad a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Gilberto is 40 years old and single.  He lives with his mother in the Pomhuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.  The main business activities in this district are agriculture, commerce, and livestock.  It is a medium-sized district with aspirations for improvement.

He is a farmer, and he has ‘capirona’ variety of rice crops that are in good condition.  He has over 15 years of experience in the field, and he has very good personal and work references in the area.

The loan will be used to buy compost and fertilizers to adequately maintain his rice crop.  With this, Gilberto hopes to improve his production and offer a better quality product to his customers.  This will allow him to get greater earnings, improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers to adequately maintain his rice crop.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
David tiene 33 años de edad, es casado, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en su casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad tranquila de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de frutales, arroz y café, ubicada en la provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café, dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace 4 años, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes. Con esto David espera obtener un mayor nivel de ingresos, lo que le permitirá aumentar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
David is 33, married, and lives with his wife and children in his own home made of local materials in the district of Pucará, a quiet community with a warm climate. The people who live there are engaged in agriculture especially the growing of fruit, rice and coffee. It is located in the province of Jaén which is part of the Cajamarca region in Peru's northern highlands. 

He has requested a loan to purchase manures and fertilizers for maintaining his coffee crop, in order to have optimal output to sell to this customers. With this, David hopes to obtain a better level of income, which will allow him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: To purchase manures and fertilizers for maintaining his coffee crop.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es una mujer muy dedicada a su trabajo, porque busca prosperidad para su familia ella tiene dos hijos que les encanta trabajar con la agricultura. Ella tiene 56 años de edad. 

Manuela es una mujer analfabeta, ya que no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, pero a pesar de esa dificultad, ella desde pequeña ha sido muy curiosa, iba con sus vecinos para ver los procesos del tejido, hasta aprenderlo, pues ahora lleva ya varios años realizando ese trabajo ahora se dedica a la compra venta de ropa típica, Manuela a pesar de su edad no tiene dificultades de tejer pasa horas tras horas en el tejido. 

Por los años que lleva trabajando y por la calidad de sus tejidos ahora tiene demanda, pero la dificultad de Manuela es que no cuenta con un capital de trabajo para la compra de materia prima, las piezas que elabora Manuela, lleva todas las tonalidades de hilo, para que la pieza quede bonito ella debe tener a la mano todo lo necesario.  

Manuela cada día que pasa, amanece con una mente  positiva para conseguir el préstamo. El anhelo de Manuela  también es conseguir otro mercado en donde vender pues ahora ella vende únicamente en su comunidad. Ella desea en el futuro mejorar su casa ya que ahora ella vive en una casita de manera, que no es tan apropiado por el material que es muy frágil.
texts.en:
Manuela is a woman who is very dedicated to her work because she seeks prosperity for her family. She has two children who love to work in agriculture. She is 56 years old.

Manuela does not know how to read or write, as she did not have the opportunity to study. Despite this difficulty, she has always been curious - ever since she was young. She would go with her neighbors to watch the weaving process until she herself learned it. Now, she has been doing this work for several years. She sells traditional clothing. Despite her age, she has no difficulties weaving, and spends hours and hours at the loom. 

Due to her experience and the quality of her weavings, she now has a demand for her goods. However, this is difficult, as she does not have the capital to purchase raw material. The pieces that she weaves have many different colored threads. For the piece to be beautiful, she needs to have all the necessary materials on hand.

With each day that passes, Manuela wakes up in hopes of obtaining the loan. Manuela also hopes to find another market in which to sell her work, as she currently only sells in her community. In the future, she hopes to improve her house; right now she lives in a wooden house, and it is not very appropriate because the material is very fragile.

loans.use: to buy raw material.

loans.name: Mario Enrique

texts.es:
Mario Enrique es un joven de 21 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Sololá junto a sus padres.

Mario es un joven que cada día que pasa busca superación en la vida, él es un muchacho que trabaja en la siembra de hortalizas, es  agricultor, pues el solicita un tercer prestamos, él manifesta que los prestamos son de vital apoyo para él, ya que esto le ha ayudado a incrementar e innovar su agricultura. 

Mario solicita nuevamente un préstamo, ya que esto le servirá para comprar semillas y fungicidas para el mantenimiento de su cultivo. Con los prestamos la vida de Mario ha cambiado ya que ahora el genera más ingresos y con las ganancias a apoyado a sus padres en cubrir algunos gastos dentro del hogar. La meta de Mario es conseguir el préstamo para ir encargando las semillas para su cultivo.
texts.en:
Mario Enrique is a 21 year old man. He lives in the community of Sololá with his parents. 

Mario is a young man who seeks how to get ahead every day of his life. He grows vegetables and is a farmer. This is his third loan. He says that the loans are a vital support for him, because they have helped him increase and innovate his farming.  

Mario is asking for a loan again, because he will use it to buy seeds and fungicides to maintain his crop. With the loans, Mario's life has changed because now he generates more income and with the profits he has helped his parents to cover some household expenses. Mario's goal is to obtain the loan to get the seeds for his crop.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Ami

texts.en:
Ami is 51 years old and married. She lives with her husband and her child. She has one son. She and her husband have had a store to sell vegetables, food and cakes for over 11 years to increase her family's income. She was pleased to be able to help her husband to improve their life.

She has asked for a loan from KPP-UMKM Syariah for 6,000,000 rupiah. This loan will be used to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at her home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family. She wants to have access to safe sanitation for her family. Her family income is still not enough to build toilets and water resources with cash, but she is able to repay the loans received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders

loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at her home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a sewer; to buy a toilet, rebar, and cement; and to pay for labor so they have good hygiene and security in her home.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is 61 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Edna is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Edna has been raising pigs for eight years and earns additional income from farming rice.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Eleanor

texts.en:
Eleanor is 63 years old and married with 10 children, one of whom is in school. Eleanor works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, sugar, canned goods, etc.

Eleanor has been in this business for six years. 

In the future, Eleanor would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, sugar, and canned goods

loans.name: Jelyn

texts.en:
Jelyn is 39 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. 

Jelyn has been in this business for 20 years.

In the future, Jelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is 46 years old and married with nine children.

Zenaida works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy & sell beverages in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy coconut wine and other beverages to sell.

Zenaida has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy & sell beverages for two years and also earns an income from a general store.

Zenaida aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy coconut wine and other beverages to sell

loans.name: Ma. Mabel

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Ma. Mabel works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane. Ma. Mabel is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Ma. Mabel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Ma. May

texts.en:
Ma. May is 42 years old and married with five children.

Ma. May works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell such as soap, milk, sugar, etc.

Ma. May has borrowed and repaid eleven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns income from farming sugarcane.

Ma. May aspires to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell such as soap, milk, sugar, etc

loans.name: Joji

texts.en:
Joji is 46 years old, married, and has one child who is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Joji runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional inventory to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, etc.

Joji has been in this business for 10 years. In the future she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase inventory such as canned goods, eggs, milk, etc

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 55 years old and married with six children.

Alicia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy & sell beverages in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock of beverages to sell.

Alicia has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy & sell beverages for three years and also earns an income from a general store.

Alicia aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of beverages to sell

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 60 years old and has three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Marilyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 9,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, beverages, groceries, etc.

Marilyn has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as soap, canned goods, coffee, milk, biscuits, candies, vinegar, soy sauce, and other groceries. 

In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, beverages, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov is a 62-year-old widowed rice farmer with two grown-up children. She lives in the Takeo province in Cambodia and has been cultivating rice for over 14 years. In addition to farming, Pov and her son make wooden knife handles to sell and her daughter sells drinks in front of their house. Together, they can earn around 10 USD per day. 

Pov is requesting a loan to buy lumber to build a house. Her wooden house is old and her loan will give her enough money to build a proper house to live in. In the future, Pov hopes to expand her businesses and her farm to improve her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy lumber to build a house

loans.name: Jesus Enrique

texts.es: Jesus de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la albañilería desde hace 9 años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra salir adelante, el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para realizarlo, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL, un crédito para la compra de cemento, ladrillos, arena, laminas, etc. para que el y su familia puedan vivir más cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Jesus is 37 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and 2 children. He has worked as a brick mason for 9 years. With what he earns from working he has been able to get ahead. 

He wants to improve his home by building a room in the space shown in the photograph above, but what he earns from his work is not enough to complete the job. For this reason he has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy cement, bricks, sand, sheeting, etc. So that he and his family can live more comfortable and secure.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, sheeting, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase  vegetables, meat, fruit, baked goods, and other supplies.

loans.name: Salvador Hilario

texts.es: Salvador de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica desde hace 30 años a la agricultura, especialmente a la siembra de maíz, frijol y yuca, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Salvador is 61 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has earned a living for 30 years in farming, especially by planting corn, beans and cassava. He sells his products in the different markets that are located near his house.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, and improve his land that is shown in the photograph. This way he can continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, and improve his land.

loans.name: Mujeres Organizadas Group

texts.es:
17 son las mujeres que integran este grupo formado en la ciudad de San Pedro, una ciudad rural, en crecimiento y de difícil acceso, es por ella que estas mujeres a la vez que van creciendo quieren ayudar a su comunidad.
La señora Elva,  trabaja en la venta de comidas que ella misma hace, y que después sale a vender, es una mujer muy soñadora, tiene muchas metas por la que esta luchando para poder crecer y salir adelante. Su sueño es tener un local donde vender su comida, y también poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de  verduras y carnes del mercado para que de esa forma pueda seguir haciendo las delicias que vende, y continuar luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 17 women. The group was formed in the city of San Pedro, which is a rural, growing city that is difficult to access. For this reason, as these women move forward, they wish to help their community.

Elva makes a living selling foods that she prepares herself and then sets out to sell. She is a woman of many dreams, and she has many goals for which she is working hard to expand and move forward. Her dream is to have a stall where she can sell her food in order to continue supporting her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables and meats at the market so that she can continue preparing the delicious foods that she sells and fighting to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and meats to prepare foods.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is 54 years old and married with five children. Marietta works very hard to provide for them.

Marietta runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like beverages, canned goods, groceries, etc.  Marietta has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future, Marietta would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like beverages, canned goods, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Nory

texts.en:
Nory is married and works selling rice in the Philippines. She has been in this business for the past year and she works hard to support her family. 

Nory is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a married parent of six children. She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from selling fish. Elena works hard to support her family. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans with NWTF.

Elena is requesting a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fishing net and other materials needed for her fishing business. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other needed materials

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.en:
Fortunata is 46 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school. For the past five years, she has run a general store in the Philippines. Fortunata works very hard to provide for her family.

Fortunata is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell such as bread, canned goods, groceries, and other products. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, toothpaste, cereals, coffee, detergent soap, fabric conditioner, and other items to sell

loans.name: Rodilla

texts.en:
Rodilla is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rodilla is 49 years old and has two children who are in school.

Rodilla has a manicure and pedicure business in the Philippines. Rodilla requested a 7,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials needed for her business. She has been in this business for 20 years. 

In the future, Rodilla would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials needed for her business.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 55 years old and married with five children. Editha works very hard to provide for them.

Editha runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, groceries, etc.  Editha has been in this business for 2 years now. 

In the future, Editha would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Элмира, 41 год, замужем, мать 4 детей. У Элмиры среднее образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи на протяжении 14 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и целеустремленности Элмиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется земельный участок мерою 0,66 ГА собственной земли, где она выращивает картофель, клевер для реализации оптовым покупателям. Также в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы и 10 овец. Супруг Элмиры занимается перевозкой грузов, зимой- угля, летом- сена. Ежемесячный доход Элмиры составляет 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 коров. Доходы от кредита Элмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Elmira is 41 years old, married and is a mother to four children. Elmira has a secondary education. As an additional source of income for her family, she has been practicing crop farming and livestock breeding for the past 14 years. Thanks to Elmira's hard work and determination, she currently owns a 0.66. hectare plot of land on which she grows potatoes and clover which she sells to wholesale distributors. She also has 2 cows and 10 sheep on her farm. Elmira's husband is a cargo transporter - in the winter, he transports coal, in the summer, hay. Elmira's average monthly income is 20,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her farm, she turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 130,000 som (KGS) to buy 3 cows. Elmira plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase three cows for fattening up and reselling.

loans.name: Ainakhan

texts.ru: Айнахан успешно погасила свой кредит, она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве Айнахан на сегодняшний день есть корова, 8 овец и лошадь. На участке мерою 0,65 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли она выращивает клевер и кукурузу. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет от 15,000 сом до 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнахан вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка 2 телят для разведения. Доходы от кредита Айнахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Ainakhan successfully paid back her previous loan. She is very grateful to Kiva and to all those who helped her finance it. Ainakhan currently has a cow, 8 sheep and a horse on her farm. On her own 0.65 hectare plot of land and a rented 1.0 hectare plot of land she grows clover and corn. Her average monthly income is between 15,000 and 20,000 som (KGS). For the further development of her business, Ainakhan once again turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase two calves to raise. Ainakhan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to buy two calves to raise.

loans.name: Maria Belen

texts.en:
Maria Belen is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Maria Belen is 32 years old and has two children who are in school.

Maria Belen has a manicure and pedicure business in the Philippines. Maria Belen requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more materials needed for her business.

Maria Belen has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Maria Belen would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials needed

loans.name: Ilse Massiel

texts.es:
A sus 19 años, Ilse  cursa  cuarto año de Ingeniería Industrial,  es una  joven apasionada y dedicada a sus estudios; anhela culminar con éxito su carrera y destacarse rápidamente en alguna empresa. Además, espera crear a largo plazo, un negocio que le genere más ingresos, a ella y a su familia, que la han apoyado en todo el proceso de  su formación. 
Ilse, solicita el financiamiento para pagar los módulos de estudio universitario y comprar el equipo de seguridad, que todo ingeniero  industrial debe poseer, como: guantes, cinturón para trabajo en altura, casco de seguridad, etc. Así, podrá continuar su desarrollo profesional  y podrá apoyarse con todas las herramientas necesarias para ser un profesional de calidad.
texts.en:
At the age of 19, Ilse is studying in the fourth year of industrial engineering. She is a passionate young woman who is dedicated to her studies. She looks forward to finishing her course with success and rapidly becoming outstanding in some business. In addition, in the long term she hopes to create a business that will generate more income for her and for her family, which has helped her through the whole process of her training.

Ilse is applying for financing to pay for her university courses and to buy safety equipment that every industrial engineer needs to have, such as gloves, a belt for working at heights, a safety helmet, etc. Thus she will be able to continue her professional development and will be able to support herself with all the necessary tools to be a professional of quality.

loans.use: to pay for her university courses and to buy safety equipment such as gloves, a belt for working at heights, a safety helmet, etc.

loans.name: Dora Francia

texts.es:
Dora una amigable, amorosa, tierna, sonriente madre de 2 hijos de 15 y 14 años de edad que desde el año 1995 tiene su negocio de chaza de alimentos, que es un pequeño establecimiento hecha de lata adecuado en la calle para vender productos como lo son refrescos, cervezas, frituras, dulces, etc. 
El sueño de dora es seguir teniendo continuidad en el mercado pues es muy feliz realizando esta actividad y ha logrado una cercanía y amistad con las personas del alrededor. 
Dora quiere solicitar un crédito para comprar bebidas, cervezas, frituras en empaquetes y chocolates para abastecer su negocio. 
Su negocio presenta una gran dificultar y es que no tiene servicio de baño pro lo que busca mejores ingresos para mudarse a un local.
texts.en:
Dora is a friendly, loving, sweet and joyful mother of two, aged 15 and 14, who has had her kiosk business since 1995.
It is a small establishment made of tin set on the street where she sells products such as soft drinks, beer, fried snacks, sweets etc.
Dora dreams of continuing with her kiosk as she is very happy going about the daily business and she has developed a closeness to the people in the vicinity.
Dora is asking for the loan to buy soft drinks, beer, packaged fried snacks and chocolates to stock her business. Her current business's drawback is that it does not have a bathroom and therefore Dora is trying to increase her profits to be able to move to a store.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, beer, fried snacks and chocolates to stock her business and start 2015 in the best possible way

loans.name: Primavera Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Primavera está en su ciclo número 1 son 17 integrantes que se unieron para poder crecer y salir adelante, ayudarse las unas a las otras, y también poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida, ya que ellas son de una zona rural muy alejada, eminentemente rural.
La Sra. Ninfa es una de las integrantes del comité, ella tiene una despensa en lo cual ofrece varios productos a sus clientes del barrio, para poder de esta forma ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia, para los cuales es el sostén de su familia. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar lácteos, carne, enlatados y otros, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group named Primavera is in their first cycle. There are 17 members that came together in order to grow and get ahead, help one another, and also improve their quality of life since they are from a distant and very rural area.

Ninfa is one of the members of the group. She has a store that offers various products to her neighborhood customers. This is the way she can keep improving her and her family's quality of life. It is what sustains her family. She is requesting this loan to be able to buy dairy products, meat, canned food and other items. This way she can keep selling like she has been. She is thankful for the opportunity that she has to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, meat, canned food and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood at wholesale

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Antonio está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción,  la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica, es una zona rural que aun está en crecimiento.
La Sra.  Andrea  es una de las integrantes, ella es de una zona alejada del centro mismo de la ciudad donde sale a vender sus  ropas y zapatos. Desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de las capacitaciones que van recibiendo, poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de ropas y calzados varios, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, y luchando de esta forma para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The group "San Antonio" is in its second loan cycle with the Program of Women's Committees in the city of Concepcion.  This is an area that is a bit outside the central area of the city; this is a rural area that is still growing.

Andrea is one of the members of this group.  She lives in a neighborhood outside the center of the city where she goes to sell her clothing and shoes.  Over time, and through the training that she is receiving, she wants to improve her living conditions for herself and her family. She is requesting this loan to buy a variety of clothing and shoes so that she can continue with her sales and, in this way, strive to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy shoes and a variety of clothing to sell

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 51 years old and married with five children. For the past 10 years, she has been farming and selling bamboo in the Philippines. Lorna also earns additional income from running a general store. 

Lorna is requesting a 13,000 PHP loan through NWT to pay laborers to harvest her bamboo. She is working tirelessly toward attaining her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to pay labor salaries to harvest bamboo

loans.name: Ma. Charina

texts.en:
Ma. Charina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell clothing business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more stocks of clothing to sell for her buy-and-sell clothing business.

Ma. Charina has been in this business for 15 years. She earns additional income by farming sugarcane. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Meken

texts.ru: Мекен, 62 года, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Мекен- высшее образование, она работает бухгалтером в Общественном фонде, получая заработную плату в размере около 6,500 сом (KGS), также пенсию - 4,800 сом (KGS). Мекен имеет очень хорошие отзывы от своих соседей и коллег. Они отзываются о ней как о целеустремленной, ответственной женщине. Доход Мекен служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на строительство дома, она купит кирпичи. В будущем Мекен планирует и дальше улучшать свои жилищные условия.
texts.en: Meken is 62 years old, married, and has three children. Meken has a higher education. She works as an accountant in an NGO where she earns about 6,500 som (KGS) salary. She also has a 4,500 som (KGS) pension. Meken has a very good reputation amongst her neighbors and colleagues. They describe her as a goal-driven, responsible woman. Meken's income serves to cover her family's food and necessary living expenses. She turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum" for a 40,000 som (KGS) loan. She wants to build a house, therefore she needs to buy bricks. In the future, Meken plans to further improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase bricks for building a house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Establecimiento de pasto mejorado para garantizar el buen pasto a su ganado en tiempo de verano, esta obra permitira obtener buen rendimiento lácteo y mejorar la economía familiar

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Divino Niño Jesus 2 está integrado con 18 mujeres, todas ellas son mujeres jefas de familia, que se unieron para poder trabajar juntas y unidas. Ellas son de una ciudad bastante alejada de la capital del país, que es rural y aun en crecimiento. 
La Sra. Claudia es una de las integrantes, ella es de una zona alejada del centro mismo de la ciudad, se dedica a la venta de comidas que ella misma hace y que después sale a vender de forma ambulante y por su barrio. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que está esforzándose por poder salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de insumos para hacer comidas, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos, hortalizas y otros, para la venta. Y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The group named Divino Niño Jesus 2 is made up of 18 women. All of them are heads of families, and they joined up to work together and united. They are from a city that is fairly distant from the capitol of the country, and is rural and still growing.

Claudia is one of the members. She is from an area that is far from the center of the city. She earns a living selling meals that she makes herself and then heads out to sell on the streets as a vendor in her neighborhood. She is a hardworking and courageous woman that is striving to get ahead and help her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients to make meals, such as meat, vegetables, condiments, produce, and other items for her sales. In this way she can keep growing with her business and then give her family what they need to have a life without deprivation.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, produce, and other items.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en: Lilia is a married woman and a mother of two children from Montebello, Leyte. She has been engaged in a hog raising business for more than five years now. This is the main source of her income. Lilia also runs a small sari-sari or variety store business. Lilia is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed. A loan will help her improve her hog raising business as well as her income and profit. In the future, Lilia hopes to make her business a success and sustainable. She also wants to save money for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and animal feed

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 44 years old and married with one child. Liza works very hard to provide for them.

Liza runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell such as eggs, canned goods and groceries.

Liza has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future, Liza would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items such as shampoo, canned goods, soft drinks, beer, snack foods, noodles and eggs to sell

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is 38 years old and married with eight children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Sarah is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed.

Sarah has been raising pigs for 5 years and earns additional income from fishing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 40 years old and married. With three children in school, Anita works very hard to provide for them.

Anita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as canned goods, shampoo, beverages and groceries.

Anita has been in this business for 5 years. 

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

In the future, Anita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 44 years old and widowed with two children.

Evangeline works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items such as canned goods, snack foods, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo and candies to sell.

Evangeline has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Evangeline aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items such as canned goods, snack foods, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo and candies to sell

loans.name: Avita

texts.en:
As a parent of five children, Avita works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from fish vending. Avita is borrowing PHP 6000 through NWTF to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her fishing business.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Avita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 6 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other materials

loans.name: Wetfalia Nahara

texts.es:
Acceder a la educación superior es un privilegio, en la mayoría de casos, siempre es una lucha constante para tener las herramientas necesarias,  que demanda este tipo de educación. Wetfalia es una joven de 24 años, que se encuentra en su último año de Ingeniería industrial. Ella ha demostrado ser  activa, emprendedora, responsable y  soñadora; ya que en sus tiempos libres se dedica a la creación y venta de manualidades, que le ayudan a sopesar  los gastos universitarios. 

Sin embargo, la joven solicita el financiamiento para pagar los últimos módulos de titulación y para comprar una computadora, que le servirá de herramienta digital en ese curso. Ella espera culminar sus estudios con éxitos y continuar con su desarrollo profesional, en las principales áreas de su interés.
texts.en:
Having access to higher education is a privilege. In the majority of cases, it is always a constant fight to have the necessary tools that this type of education requires. Wetfalia is a 24-year-old young woman. She is studying industrial engineering, and she is in her last year. She has shown that she is active, entrepreneurial, responsible, and a dreamer. In her free time, she makes and sells crafts, which helps her cover her university expenses. 

Nevertheless, she is requesting a loan to cover the cost of her final degree requirements and to buy a computer, which will serve as a digital tool that will help her with her courses. She hopes to finish her studies successfully and to continue her professional development in her main areas of interest.

loans.use: to cover the cost of her final degree requirements and to buy a computer.

loans.name: Chantha Group

texts.en: Chantha is a 34-year-old married mother of three children, who lives in the Tbong Khmum province in Cambodia. Two of her children are in school. Chantha and her husband, who is 39 years old, cultivate a kind of tropical yam to sell and they have been in this work since 2004, making an income of USD 15 each day. Chantha wants to improve her entire family’s standards of hygiene, therefore she would like to request a group loan with three members and she will use her portion to buy parts for a latrine. Regarding her future plans, she would like to expand her farming, renovate her house and support her children to earn bachelor degrees.

loans.use: to buy parts for a latrine

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia is a 52-year-old married woman and a mother of one son from Montebello, Leyte. She has been engaged in a hog raising business for more than 10 years now. This is the source of her income. Lydia is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed. A loan will help her improve her hog raising business as well as her income and profit. In the future, Lydia hopes of making her business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and animal feed

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan had entrenched her business. She was able to purchase additional grocery products needed to increase her product inventory. The loan also helped her provide for the educational expense of her child and pay for their daily needs.

She is very positive that she could improve her business further. This new loan of PHP 12,000 will go to additional stocks of groceries, toiletries and beverages. Her customers are likely to buy more items if she has more products displayed. An increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will also help her business to become viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she can sustain the needs of her family.

Aside from her variety store, Jocelyn also operates a room for rent. She dreams of succeeding in life and business and she is planning for an expansion. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for beverages, toiletries and other grocery products.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a 41-year-old married woman with two children, both of whom attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 
Evangeline has a business, direct selling Avon products in the Philippines. Evangeline requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy more products from Avon such as deodorant, lotion and lipsticks to sell to her customers.

Evangeline has been in this business for 8 years. In the future, Evangeline would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more products from Avon such as deodorant, lotion and lipsticks to sell to her customers

loans.name: Lucrina

texts.en:
Lucrina is 46 years old and married with eight children.

Lucrina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, beverages, eggs and groceries.

Lucrina has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Lucrina aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell such as canned goods, beverages, eggs and groceries.

loans.name: Ma. Helen

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Ma. Helen works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and earns income from fish vending. Ma. Helen is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her fishing business.

Ma. Helen has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other materials

loans.name: Francia Ines

texts.es:
Trabajadora y humilde es como se describe a Doña Francia, una mujer de 46 años, quien desde joven ha trabajado arduamente y que desde hace 12 años  se dedica a la venta de helados, hielo y gaseosas. Su negocio nació a raíz de que se dedicó a la crianza y cuido de sus hijas, ahora este mismo, le permite apoyar la manutención de su madre enferma. 

Francia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas y los ingredientes de sus helados, y así, de esta manera con esfuerzo salir adelante y lograr lo que se propone, por esto, Francia se propone luchar siempre por su negocio. Además, ella piensa de las ganancias de su negocio, poco a poco reparar la casita de su madre y verla feliz.
texts.en:
Hardworking and humble is how Francia describes herself; a woman of 46, she has worked arduously since she was young and from the time she was 12 she has sold ice cream, ice, and soft drinks.  Her business was born from her need to raise and care for her children and now it allows her to support her sick mother.  

Francia is requesting this loan to buy soft drinks and the ingredients for her ice creams and thereby be able to get ahead and achieve what she has set out to do.
