Nancy (en la foto la que está sentada de chompa verde)es una mujer de 37 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos de 15 y  10 años de edad, y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo. 
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, responsable, buena madre y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona Sur de ciudad de la Paz caracterizada por la cantidad de oficinas que abarcan todos los rubros, de clima cálido t con una temperatura ambiente que ronda los 14 a 20 grados centígrados.
Nancy  es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, estatura mediana, complexión física robusta, su lengua nativa es el español Su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja como empleado público y sus dos hijos en edad escolar. Su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de marcas muy conocidas a nivel internacional,  se dedica a la venta de cosméticos a tiempo completo; ella recorre toda la zona, ingresando a las distintas oficinas y ofertando a nuevos clientes y vendiendo/cobrando a antiguos clientes. Su labor la realiza todos los días de la semana; durante los días hábiles realiza visitas en el centro de la ciudad, los fines de semana tiene clientes en ferias dominicales en diferentes lugares. Su sueño es establecerse en su zona de trabajo como vendedora mayorista, y desea ampliar su negocio realizando la compra de cosméticos por mayor, porque las ventas a fin de año aumentan y no quiere perderlas por el beneficio de su familia. Esta es su primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución y lleva tres años de experiencia realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Nancy solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de belleza por mayor para aprovechar las ventas de fin de año.
texts.en:
The communal bank LOS SUERTUDOS 21 comprises eight members: seven women and one man.  They are involved in different business activities including fruit sales, juice sales, mechanical work, clothing sales, cosmetic sales, food sales and vegetable sales.  They are requesting a loan to expand their businesses.

Nancy (seated and wearing a green sweater in the picture) is 37 years old, married and has two children, ages 15 and 10.  She sells cosmetics by catalogue.  She is an enterprising, independent, responsible, hard-working, kind mother.  She works in the soutern part of the city of La Paz which is an area known for its many offices in every sector.  The climate is warm with an average temperature of 14 to 20 degrees Celsius.

Nancy has a dark complexion, long black hair, and a short, robust physique.  Her native language is Spanish.  She shares her life with her husband who works as a civil servant and their two children who attend school.  She sells internationally known brands of cosmetics and works full time.  She goes all over, visiting the different offices in the area and offering her products to new customers, and selling to and collecting payment from her old ones.

She works every day of the week.  During the week she visits the city center and on weekends she visits customers at the different Sunday markets.  Her dream is to become a wholesale vendor in the area.  She wants to expand her business buying wholesale cosmetics because of the increased demand at the end of the year.  She does not want to lose the opportunity for the benefit of her family.  This is her first loan through the institution in the three years she has been in this business.

The loan Nancy is requesting is to buy wholesale beauty products to take advantage of the increased demand.

loans.use: To buy wholesale beauty products.

loans.name: Celsa

texts.es:
La socio Celsa se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de pollos y pescados,la socia vende en el mercado,la socia tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de animales,la socia cria cuyes,pollos y chanchos y por medio de estos negocios la socia quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de pollos y pescados.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pollos y pescados.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Celsa continues to manage her business of selling chickens and fish at the market. In addition, she continues to raise animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs. Through these businesses, she wants to help her children get ahead. Her dream is to expand her business of selling chickens and fish.

Celsa is requesting a loan in order to buy chickens and fish. She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy chickens and fish.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María, de 27 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 niños y está embarazada de su tercer hijo, estudió hasta tercer grado, se le presentaron muchas dificultades para seguir sus estudios, a pesar de todo ha salido adelante con su familia.
María, se dedica a los oficios domésticos, de esta manera lleva alimento a sus 2 hijos de 9 y 7 años de edad, que empiezan a asistir a la escuela.

Debido a su bajo nivel escolar, no tiene muchas opciones de trabajo, así que lo que puede hacer es oficios domésticos.- Actualmente, trabaja para una señora que se dedica a la venta de comida por la mañana y en la tarde realiza actividades del hogar.

Muchas son las necesidades de María, pero en esta ocasión, quiere mejorar la casa de su familia para hacerla más amplia, ya que el espacio es pequeño y con el hijo que espera necesitara más espacio en su vivienda, es por eso que ha decidido comprar laminas, madera, y pagar mano de obra para construir un cuarto, para darles a sus hijos una mejor comodidad.

En un futuro María, desea tener una vida más digna, con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo podrá lograrlo, dándole a sus 3 hijos, un hogar que reúna las condiciones básicas para que su  familia viva en un ambiente agradable, cómodo y seguro.- Además, de ayudarles en su educación para que logren superarse y solventar todas sus necesidades.
texts.en:
María, 27, is a single mother with two children and she is expecting her third.  She has a third grade education since it was very difficult for her to continue her studies.  Despite everything, she has been able to get ahead with her family.  She works as a domestic employee and is able to feed her two children, ages 9 and 7, who are starting to attend school.

Because of her lack of education she does not have many work options, but working as a domestic employee is something she can do.  In the morning she works for a woman who sells food and in the afternoon she takes care of her own household.

María has many needs but on this occasion she wants to make the home bigger for the family.  The house is small now and requires more living space for when the baby is born.  She has decided to buy metal sheeting and wood, and hire workers to build a room so the family can be more comfortable.

In the future María would like to have a more dignified life, and with a lot of sacrifice and effort she will be able to achieve it.  She wants to give her three children a home with the basic essentials to live in a nice, comfortable, safe environment.  She also wants to give them an education so they can have a future and cover their individual needs.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting and wood, and to hire workers to build a room.

loans.name: Reinilda

texts.es:
Reinalda esta estudiando ciencias de la educación, por medio de sus estudios quiere poder ser alguien en la vida, a la vez que podrá ayudar a las personas en algo tan importante como lo es en la educación. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar nuevamente las cuotas de su carrera, y así poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Reinilda is studying Educational Sciences. Through her studies, she wants to make something out of her life. At the same time, she would like to help people with something so important as obtaining an education. She says that her previous loan was used to pay her degree fees.

Reinilda is requesting this loan so that she can pay her degree fees once again. This will enable her to continue her studies just as before.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La socia Victoria se sigue dedicando al negocio de protesis dental,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es teenr un consultorio dental.La socia solicita el credito para comprar una silla odontologica.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Victoria continues to manage a dental prosthetics business. Through this business, she is able to get ahead. Her dream is to have a dental office. She is requesting a loan in order to buy a dentist's chair.

Victoria is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy a dentist's chair.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos, de 64 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, ya que los ingresos no eran suficientes, para dedicarse solo a estudiar, está casado y su esposa es de mucha ayuda en el trabajo agrícola. 

Santos, ha trabajado en la ganadería y la agricultura, desde temprana edad.

Santos, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado.

El, sueña con que sus hijos aprendan bien el trabajo, para que puedan tener una fuente de ingreso segura, pero que también estudien.
texts.en:
Santos, 64, only studied until fourth grade because he did not have enough income to support his education.  He is married and his wife helps him a lot with his agricultural work. 

He has worked with livestock and agriculture since an early age.  

He needs the loan to buy cattle.

He hopes that his children learn the trade well, so that they can have a dependable source of income.  However, he also wants them to continue studying.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Idalia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Idalia, de 35 años de edad, es madre de tres hijos, estudio hasta séptimo grado, abanonó sus estudios por la falta de apoyo de sus padres, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a trabajar en diversas actividades del campo.

Idalia, trabaja como empleada doméstica y le pagan el salario mínimo; con esto ayuda a las necesidades de su hogar, ésta actividad la realiza desde pequeña, pero hasta hace 2 años tiene una remuneración por lo que hace.- Para llegar hasta el lugar donde labora, camina 10 minutos y horario es de 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 de la tarde, luego va a descansar a su casa, para madrugar el día siguiente.
 
Las necesidades de su familia son diversas, pero se ha puesto de acuerdo con su esposo para darle prioridad a ampliar su casa, ya que el espacio que tienen es muy reducido y presenta algunas dificultades, es por eso que ha decidido ocupar el crédito para comprar ladrillo, cemento, arena y pagar mano de obra para realizar el trabajo, esto mejorará las condiciones de su familia, al disponer de una mayor comodidad.

Idalia, piensa mucho en su familia, por el aprecio que les tiene y sueña en poder mejorar su calidad de vida, ayudando a sus hijos para que estudien y puedan tener una educación avanzada y asegurar su prosperidad en un ambiente cómodo, seguro y adecuado.
texts.en:
Idalia, 35, is the mother of three children.  She has a seventh grade education but had to drop out of school because her parents could not afford it.  She lives with her husband who works in different farm activities.

Idalia works as a domestic employee and earns the minimum wage which she contributes to the household expenses.  She has done this work since she was young but has been earning wages just for two years.  She must walk ten minutes to get to her job and works from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.  She goes home to rest and gets up early the next morning.

The needs of her family are varied but she and her husband have both agreed that expanding the house is their priority.  Their house is small and has some difficulties so they are requesting a loan to buy bricks, cement and sand, and to hire a construction worker.  The project will improve the family's living conditions because they will be more comfortable.

Idalia thinks a lot about her family and how much she loves them.  She wants to give them a better quality of life and help the children get a higher education.  This is to insure they will be prosperous and live in a comfortable, safe, sound environment.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement and sand, and to hire construction workers.

loans.name: Inmer Eliú

texts.es:
Inmer, de 24 años de edad, está soltero, estudio hasta séptimo grado, debido a la situación económica de su familia, no pudo continuar estudiando, fue por esa razón que tuvo que buscar una fuente de ingresos para cubrir algunas necesidades de su hogar, actualmente vive con sus padres y 2 hermanos.

Inmer, a pesar de que tiene un grado de estudio muy bajo, sabe tomar  decisiones muy valiosas, que ayudan a su familia para superar muchos problemas económicos que se presentan, ya que puede realizar diversos trabajos, sus ingresos son variables, pero su esfuerzo más grande lo realiza en la albañilería y el comercio de pescado.- Se dedica a estas actividades, desde hace 8 años y lo ha podido mejorar con la experiencia, trabaja como albañil en ocasiones, pero cuando no tiene trabajo de este tipo, se dedica a la venta pescado en su cantón. 

El financiamiento lo utilizará para comprar hieleras nuevas, para andar su pescado fresco y sin dañarse, con esto él podrá brindar, producto de calidad e higiene a sus clientes, esto mejorará su negocio.

En un futuro Inmer, pretende implementar su propia producción de pescado, para sacarlo a la venta y ampliar su negocio, haciendo su propia pecera, ya que dispone de agua y terreno para hacerlo.- Pero además, sueña con tener su propia casa, con sus condiciones básicas.
texts.en:
Inmer, 24, is single and has a seventh grade education.  Because of his family's economic situation he was unable to continue his studies, so he had to go to work to earn an income to cover household expenses.  He currently lives with his parents and two siblings.

Despite his lack of education, Inmer knows how to make valuable decisions that help his family overcome the many economic problems they face.  He is able to work at different jobs.  His income varies but most of his effort goes into bricklaying activity and fish sales.  For eight years he has been doing both activities to get more experience.  He works as a bricklayer sometimes and when there is no work he sells fish in his area.

He will use the loan to buy new coolers to sell his fish and keep it fresh.  This will add quality and hygiene to the product, improving his business.

In the future Inmer wants to raise his own fish and expand his business.  He would establish his own fish farm since he has the water and land available to do so.  He also wants to have his own house and basic utilities one day.

loans.use: To buy new coolers to carry fresh fish.

loans.name: William Alexander

texts.es:
William, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar y tiene 3 hijos. 

William, a pesar de que tiene un grado de estudio muy bajo, sabe tomar  decisiones muy valiosas, que ayudan a su familia para superar muchos problemas económicos que se presentan, ya que puede realizar diversos trabajos, sus ingresos son variables, pero su esfuerzo más grande lo realiza en la albañilería y el comercio de pescado.- Se dedica a estas actividades, desde hace 8 años y lo ha podido mejorar con la experiencia, trabaja como albañil en ocasiones, pero cuando no tiene trabajo de este tipo, se dedica a la venta pescado en su cantón. 

El financiamiento lo utilizará para comprar hieleras nuevas, para andar su pescado fresco y sin dañarse, con esto él podrá brindar, producto de calidad e higiene a sus clientes, esto mejorará su negocio.

En un futuro William, pretende implementar su propia producción de pescado, para sacarlo a la venta y ampliar su negocio, haciendo su propia pecera, ya que dispone de agua y terreno para hacerlo.- Pero además, sueña con tener su propia casa, con sus condiciones básicas.
texts.en:
William 25, has a fifth grade education.  His wife is a homemaker, and they have three children.

Despite his lack of education, William knows how to make very valuable decisions to help the family overcome the many economic problems they face.  He is able to work at several jobs, with a variable income.  His greatest effort is dedicated to bricklaying and selling fish.  He has worked in both jobs for eight years to get more experience.  Sometimes he works as a bricklayer, but when there is no work he sells fish in the area where he lives.

The loan will be used to buy new coolers to keep the fish fresh so he can offer more quality and hygiene to his customers.  This will improve the business.

In the future William wants to raise his own fish to expand his business.  He has the water and land to set up his own fish farm.  He also wants to have his own house with basic utilities one day.

loans.use: To buy new coolers to keep his fish fresh.

loans.name: Blanca María

texts.es:
Portoviejo es capital de la Provincia de Manabí a 35 km de la ciudad de Manta. Está ubicada a pocos minutos de la playa de Crucita, donde se puede estar en contacto con la naturaleza y disfrutar del sol y de sus tranquilas olas.  Con su clima cálido seco.
Aquí vive la señora Ligia, tiene 70 años, es soltera y tiene 5  hijas mayores de edad, ella vive con una hija desde hace 11 años, no tiene casa propia.
Doña Ligia es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudar con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de zapatos por catálogo (sandalias, deportivos, fiesta, etc.). Trabaja todos los días a la semana ocho horas al día, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 8 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
El Crédito lo solicita para comprar zapatos en promoción y así obtener más ganancias con las ventas. Es socia desde hace 15 años y le gusta por la unidad que hay en el grupo y la sinceridad de la institución con las socias.
texts.en:
Portoviejo is the capital of the province of Manabí, 35 km from the city of Manta. It is just a few minutes from the beach of Crucita,  where one can have contact with nature and enjoy the sun and the peaceful waves. It has a dry climate. 

This is where Ligia lives. She is 70 years old, single and has five grown children. She has lived with one daughter for 11 years and doesn't have her own house. 

Ligia is a housewife who in order to obtain her own resources and help with the household expenses sells shoes by catalog (sandals, athletic shoes, dress shoes, etc.). She works every day of the week for eight hours a day. She sells her products on credit and collects every week. She has been doing this activity for 8 years and it is going very well for her.

She is asking for the loan to buy shoes that are on sale and thus make more profits with the sales. She has been a member for 15 years and she likes it because of the unity and the sincerity the institution has with the members.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 10 sheets of laminate, wood, cement, sand and bricks to build a water tank.

loans.name: Miriam Mercedes

texts.es:
En El Sitio EL Limón del cantón EL Carmen cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Mariano, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura, las personas cultivan piñas, café, cacao, plátano por ser un clima húmedo propio para estos cultivos.
En este lugar vive la señora Miriam, tiene 58 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión  libre y de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ella y también una pequeña nieta que la adora como su hija y la cual está en escuela. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa local y también es agricultor.
Doña Miriam es una mujer que le gusta ganar lo suyo para salir adelante, ella  tiene un restaurante que con la ayuda de sus hijas prepara desayunos, almuerzos y meriendas,  ella varia el menú para satisfacer a sus clientes los mismos que la prefieren por esta razón, trabajan todos los días desde las 5h00 hasta la noche, llevan con su restaurante 20 años y  le ha ido muy bien, parte del crédito es también para comprar insecticidas y fertilizantes pues también tienen cultivos de maracuyá. 
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros ingredientes para la preparación de los alimentos así como también insecticidas y fertilizantes. Lleva 6 meses  en el Grupo De Crédito desde y le gusta porque el grupo es muy unido y responsable. Sus sueños son mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
In El Limón in El Carmen canton, the Mariano communal bank group meets every two weeks. This place is known for being very dynamic where the majority of the inhabitants work in agriculture. The people grow pineapple, coffee, cocoa, and plantains due to the humid climate suitable for these crops. 

Miriam lives in this place. She is 58 years old, in a common-law marriage, and in this relationship she has three adult children, two of whom still live with her, and also a little granddaughter, who she adores like a daughter, and who goes to school.  Her husband works at a local business and also is a farmer. 

Miriam is a woman who likes to earn her own income to get ahead. She has a restaurant where, with the help of her daughters, she prepares breakfasts, lunches, and snacks. She varies the menu to satisfy her customers, who prefer her for this reason. They work every day from 5:00 am to night. They have had their restaurant for 20 years and it has gone well. Part of this loan is also to purchase insecticide and fertilizer since they also grow a passion fruit crop.

This loan will be used to purchase rice, meat, fish and other ingredients to prepare the dishes, and also insecticide and fertilizer. She has been in the communal bank group for 6 months and she likes it because the group is very close and responsible. Her dream is to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase rice, meat, fish and other ingredients, and insecticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Blanca Edith

texts.es:
Portoviejo es capital de la Provincia de Manabí a 35 km de la ciudad de Manta. Está ubicada a pocos minutos de la playa de Crucita, donde se puede estar en contacto con la naturaleza y disfrutar del sol y de sus tranquilas olas.  Con su clima cálido seco.
Aquí vive la señora Blanca, tiene 63 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos mayores  de edad e independientes, su esposo es radiotécnico, ellos tienen casa propia.
Doña Blanca para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que con lo que él hace no alcanza para cubrir los gastos hace varios años empezó un negocio, ella tiene un pequeño Bazar en su casa en el cual vende (útiles escolares, ropa (camisetas, medias, interiores, perfumes de muchas marcas, etc.)Trabaja sola y cuando está desocupada su hija le ayuda pero la señora Blanca es quien atiende. Su negocio lo tiene más de 20 años, deja a crédito le pagan cada 15 días. Hasta el momento le va muy bien y piensa en hacer más grande el local.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar perfumes, ropa interior, medias, camisetas, entre otros. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 17 años  y le gusta porque es muy unido el grupo.  Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y tener un local más grande con más variedad de productos y satisfacer las necesidades de sus compradores.
texts.en:
Portoviejo is the capital of Manabí province, 35 km from the city of Manta. It is located a few minutes from Crucita beach, where one can be in touch with nature and also enjoy the sun and the peaceful waves. It has a dry, warm climate.

Blanca lives here. She is 63 years old, married, and has 3 adult children who are independent. Her husband is a radio engineer. They have their own house.

Blanca, to help her husband with the household expenses, since with what he earns, it isn't enough to cover the expenses, began her own business some years ago. She has a small general store in her house where she sells school supplies and clothing (shirts, stockings, lingerie, many brands of perfume, etc.). She works alone and when she's not busy, her daughter helps her but Blanca is the one who serves the customers. She has had her business for more than 20 years and she leaves her items on credit and they pay her every two weeks. To date, it has gone very well and she is thinking to make the space larger.

This loan will be used to purchase perfumes, lingerie, stockings, shirts, and others. She has been in the communal bank group for the past 17 years and she likes it because the group is very close. Her goals are to continue with her business and have a larger space with more variety in products and to satisfy her buyers' needs.

loans.use: to purchase perfume, lingerie, stockings, shirts, etc.

loans.name: Santos Andrés

texts.es:
Santos, de 32 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado en la escuela de su comunidad, es casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, aun no tienen hijos y viven solos.

Santos, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado y cerdos, decidió trabajar desde hace tres años de esta manera, ya que tenía una situación bastante complicada y percibió que este negocio era rentable.- El aprendió este negocio, gracias a su suegro, pues se dedica a la misma actividad. Antes, era un agricultor muy productivo, sembraba maíz frijol y maicillo, la distancia de su casa al trabajo, provocaba mucho cansancio, ya que estaba bastante retirado, a él siempre le ha ayudado su esposa. 

Con el financiamiento Santos, comprará una ternera y un quintal de alambre de púa, para cercar en donde tendrá la ternera y también un quintal de harinilla para alimentarla. La necesidad que se solventará con el préstamo es, que Santos, ya no tendrá que alquilar terreno para tener su ternera.  
 
El sueño de Santos es, un día poder tener una buena granja de ganado y un terreno con mejores condiciones, para poder pastar a sus vacas, así mismo el desea ampliar su casita, para que cuando empiece a multiplicarse su familia, puedan tener las comodidades necesarias.
texts.en:
Santos is 32 years old. He went to school up to the third grade in a community school. He is married and his wife is a housewife. They don't have any children yet and they live alone.

Santos works buying and selling cattle and pigs. He decided to do this work three years ago, because he was in a very complicated situation and he saw taht this business was profitable. He learned about this business thanks to his father in law because he works at the same activity. Before, he was a very productive farmer. He grew beans and sorghum. The distance from his house to the work was very tiring because it was very fire away. His wife has always helped him.  

With the loan, Santos will buy a heifer and a quintal of barbed wire to fence in the area where he will keep the heifer. He will also buy a quintal of millfeed to feed it. The need this loan will feed is that Santos will no longer have to rent land to keep his heifer. 
 
Santos' dream is to have a good cattle ranch and land in better conditions so that he can graze his cows. He also wants to expand his house so that when his family starts to grow he can have the room he needs.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
Portoviejo es capital de la Provincia de Manabí a 35 km de la ciudad de Manta. Está ubicada a pocos minutos de la playa de Crucita, donde se puede estar en contacto con la naturaleza y disfrutar del sol y de sus tranquilas olas.  Con su clima cálido seco.
En este lugar vive la señora Evangelina, tiene  48 años, divorciada, de este matrimonio tiene una hija mayor  de edad, ella tiene casa propia.
Doña Evangelina con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto salir adelante en el hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local con mercadería (camisetas, ropa interior, etc.). Trabaja todos los días dos horas, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada quince días o al mes de acuerdo a lo que necesite. Tiene 14 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños.  Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace 20 años  y le gusta por la facilidad de pago, la constancia del grupo y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Portoviejo is the capital of Manabí province, 35 km from the city of Manta. It is located a few minutes from Crucita beach, where one can be in touch with nature and enjoy the sun and the peaceful waves. It has a warm, dry climate. 

Evangelina lives here. She is 48 years old, divorced, and from this marriage has an adult daughter. She has her own house.

Evangelina, with the intention of earning something on her own, and with this, getting ahead in her household, works selling all sorts of clothing. She does it door-to-door and also sells from her house where she has a small retail space with merchandise (shirts, lingerie, etc.). She works two hours every day, she leaves the items on credit with her customers and collects every two weeks. She goes to Guayaquil to purchase her merchandise every two weeks or every month, depending on what she needs. She has been working at this for 14 years and it is going very well.

This loan will be used to purchase more merchandise such as pants, blouses, shirts and children's clothing. She has been a member of the communal bank group for 20 years and she likes it for the ease of payments, the group's perseverance, and the responsibility.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD –CCACHIMAYO,la socia continua  dedicándose a su negocio de restaurante ,la socia continua elaborando platos como arroz con pollo, saltados, sopas entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose  este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia,la siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como menestras, aceite, arroz entre otros.
La socia se compromete a hacer sus pagos en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This client belongs to the SOLIDARIDAD –CCACHIMAYO Communal Bank, and is still running her restaurant. She prepares dishes such as chicken and rice, saltados (stir-fried beef with vegetables), soups, and many others that her customers order. She opened the restaurant years ago, and the diligent efforts she puts into it have paid off as business is good and she's able to provide for her family. 

The client is applying for a loan for the purchase of items such as lentils, cooking oil, rice, and other supplies, and is committed to making the loan repayments on time.

loans.use: for the purchase of items such as lentils, cooking oil, rice, and other supplies.

loans.name: Wil Antonio

texts.es:
Wil, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, por sus condiciones económicas, no pudo continuar, está acompañado, su compañera de vida, se dedica a los oficios del hogar, es padre de una niña de 5 meses de edad y por el momento viven en casa de su suegra. 

Wil, se ha dedicado a la agricultura toda su vida, está ha sido su principal fuente de ingresos, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió de su padre, ya que siempre le acompañó a trabajar la tierra y fue por eso que decidió este oficio, el terreno donde cultiva, está cerca de su casa y su pareja siempre le ha apoyado en sus trabajos.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar 1000 tejas para el techo de su casa y para pagar la mano de obra, será de gran satisfacción el crédito ya que él vera finalizada su casa.
 
El sueño de Wil, es terminar su casa para vivir más cómodo y con mucha más privacidad con su esposa e hija.- También, sueña con comprar una vaca, para que le proporcione parte de la alimentación de su familia.
texts.en:
Wil, 24 years old, studied until high school but was unable to continue due to his financial conditions. He is married. His life partner maintains their home. He is the father of a 5 month old girl and for the time being, they live in his mother in law’s home.

Wil has worked in agriculture all of his life. This has been his main source of income. He learned everything he knows from his father since he always accompanied him to work the land and this is why he decided upon this job. The land where he cultivates is close to his home and his partner has always supported him in his work.

He needs the loan to buy 1,000 tiles for the roof of his home and to pay labor costs. The loan will be most welcome since it would see his home to completion.

Wil’s dream is to finish his home to live more comfortably with his wife and daughter and with much more privacy. He also dreams of buying a cow so that it provides some nourishment to his family.

loans.use: to buy 1,000 tiles for the roof of his home and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Hello world, meet Priscilla. Priscilla is a hard-working, small-scale farmer in Litein, which is a small, rural town in the tea-growing region of Kenya. 

For the last five years of her life, Priscilla has been doing mixed farming. This has worked out well for her since she has been able to provide a decent living for her lovely family. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, and crops. 

Priscilla is seeking a loan to construct a dairy shed. This will provide shelter for her favorite animal, named Priscilla. The thing she enjoys most about dairy farming is selling milk. However, in order for a dairy cow to be more productive, the farmer needs to be good at dairy management. Your loan will help Priscilla construct a cowshed that will help very much with dairy management. The shelter will enable her to prepare food rations and feed the cow. The shed will also ensure the cow is always in a clean and hygienic environment. 

Your loan will bring untold benefits to Priscilla. She is projecting a significant increase in milk production. The extra money will go to loan repayment and her children’s education. Her dream is for her children to live a better life with fulfilled, basic needs.

loans.use: To construct a modern dairy shed.

loans.name: Rosa Emerita

texts.es:
Rosa, de 60 años de edad, no tuvo el privilegio de estudiar, actualmente está casada, es madre de 8 hijos, dos de ellos ya tienen su propio hogar, los otros cuatro se encuentran estudiando y dos trabajan, solo seis de sus hijos viven con ella y su esposo.

Rosa, se dedica a los oficios del hogar, toda su vida ha realizado esas actividades, su esposo es quien trabaja, para poder llevar el sustento diario a su casa; él se dedica a sembrar maíz, frijol, maicillo y también siembra tomates.

El crédito será para comprar 3 quintales de hierro, 500 ladrillos y también 15 bolsas de cemento, para construir una fosa séptica. La necesidad cubierta por el financiamiento será, tener una fosa en buen estado y evitar enfermedades en sus familiares y ella misma. 
 
El sueño de Rosa, es tener baños lavables en su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa, 60 years old, did not have the privilege of going to school. She is now married and the mother of 8 children, 2 of whom have their own homes. Another four are students and two work. Only six of their children live with her and her husband. 

Rosa works at the domestic chores. She has done this work her whole life. Her husband is the one who works to bring the daily sustenance to the house. He works growing corn, beans, sorghum, and also tomatoes. 

The loan will be to purchase 3 quintales [approximately 300 pounds] of iron, 500 bricks, and also 15 sacks of cement to build a septic tank. The need met by the loan will be to have a septic tank in good condition and prevent illnesses in her family members and herself.

Rosa's dream is to have a full indoor bathroom in her house.

loans.use: to purchase para 3 quintales [approximately 300 pounds] of iron, 500 bricks, and also 15 sacks of cement to build a septic tank.

loans.name: Cecilia Nicolasa

texts.es: Cecilia de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella posee una pequeña farmacia ubicada en su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada por esa razón posee muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas medicinas por mayor para surtir su negocio y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cecilia is 46 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and son.  She owns and operates a small pharmacy from her home which is in a heavily traveled area so she has a lot of clients.  With her sales she's able to cover the house expenses.  
She's requesting a loan to buy more wholesale medicines to stock her store and have better income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more wholesale medicines.

loans.name: Neang

texts.en:
Neang, 33, comes from a community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has two children who are students. To make a living, she has been involved with a farming business since 1998, growing rice and selling her agricultural product to the local dealers and customers. She is able to generate a net profit of USD 3.00 a day, on average.

This farming season, she is lacking money to buy some farm supplies for her farmland. To continue her farming, she is borrowing some money from KIVA now to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides.  

She is thankful to lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el posee una panadería ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 2 años donde elabora y vende pan francés, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad con que elabora el pan, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante con las gastos que se le presentan en el hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de harina, levadura, moldes, latas, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rigoberto lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has had a bakery located in their residence for 2 years where he makes and sells french bread. He has many customers due to the quality of the bread. With the income that he makes he can deal with the household expenses.

He is asking for a loan to buy flour, yeast, molds, tins, etc. to continue his work and increase income for an improved quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, molds, tins, etc.

loans.name: Ana Veronica

texts.es: Ana de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace 2 años a la venta de ropa, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa para damas y caballeros por mayor y así continuar con sus ventas y poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Ana is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her husband. She has worked for the last two years selling clothes. Her business is located at her home and she has many clients. Ana's sales allow her to pay for her household expenses. She is requesting a loan to purchase women's and men's clothing at wholesale prices and thus be able to continue selling and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase women's and men's clothing at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Donatila

texts.es:
Donatila tiene 54 años, es soltera, vive con su familia en el distrito de Cayaltí, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad donde la vida es tranquila, la población se dedica al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos como queso, aceitunas y embutidos, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como queso, aceitunas y embutidos para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Donatila espera satisfacer los gustos y preferencias de sus clientes lo que tendrá un gran impacto en su negocio y le permitirá incrementar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Donatila is 54 years old. She is single. She  lives with her family in the Cayaltí district located in the Chiclayo province within the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. She lives in a community where life is calm. The people work in business, agriculture and animal husbandry.

She sells products like cheese, olives and cold cuts. She has some experience and the business and she has many good personal and professional references in the area. The loan will be used to purchase a greater amount of products like cheese, olives and cold cuts to increase the stock in her business. Donatila hopes to satisfy the tastes and preferences of her customers. This will have a great impact in her business and allow her to increase her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: purchase cheese, olives, etc. to increase her business' inventory.

loans.name: 14 Lạch Trường Hải Lộc Group

texts.en:
Thếm operates a food stall selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell. Thếm has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Thếm faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Thếm is 64 years old and she is married with 7 children.

Thếm is the group leader of the 14 Lạch Trường Hải Lộc solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. In 2012 Thếm joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thếm has successfully repaid 4 loans. 

With her business profit, Thếm hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable and resell.

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marissa is 35 years old, and has two children who are currently in school.

Marissa has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines. Marissa requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of dried fish to sell to her customers.

Marissa has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of dried fish

loans.name: Shiela

texts.en:
Shiela works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a buy and sell mango business in the Philippines.

Shiela requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more mangos to sell.

She has been in this business for six years now.

Shiela would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more mangos

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is 45 years old and married with six children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Elena has been in this business for eight years.

In the future, Elena would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Maginda

texts.en:
Maginda is 30 years old and married.

Maginda is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Maginda requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Maginda has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Maginda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Sebastiana Ymelda

texts.es:
Sebastiana Ymelda tiene 67 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros, en una tienda que se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio, cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Sebastiana Ymelda espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores niveles de ingreso y le va a permitir tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sebastiana Ymelda is 67 years old. She lives with her husband in the Zaña district, a community located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. District residents work mainly in agriculture, commerce, and livestock.

Sebastiana makes a living selling groceries such as rice, sugar, and oil--among others--in a store she runs from her house. She has experience in this business and very good personal and work references in the local region. Sebastiana has requested a loan to buy bulk quantities of merchandise such as rice, sugar, oil, and noodles--among others--and thus increase her inventory. She hopes this will help her offer a greater variety of products to her clients, generate greater income, and enable her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bulk quantities of merchandise such as rice, sugar, oil, and noodles--among others--and thus increase her inventory.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en: Jose is a patient and determined person. He is 52 years old and a store owner at Enrile. He is also engaged in junkshop services, buying and selling scrap materials for additional income. He wanted to keep increasing his income, which is why he is now asking for additional capital of 13,000 PHP to buy soft drinks, biscuits, canned goods, noodles, and eggs to sell. This will help increase his income and enable him to save additional profits for emergency purposes. He hopes to continously offer good products and services.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, biscuits, canned goods, noodles, and eggs to sell

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Juliet is 48 years old, and has one child who is currently in school.

Juliet has a fishing business in the Philippines. Juliet requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials and gear for her fishing business.

Juliet has been in this business for 11 years. Juliet would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and gear for her fishing business

loans.name: Jose Elizandro

texts.es: Jose de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica desde hace 14 años a la crianza de ganado de repasto y adicional también se dedica a la siembra de granaos básicos, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de un novilla para seguir con la crianza de ganado y poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Jose is 34 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner. For 14 years he has earned a living raising grass-fed livestock. He also grows basic grains and sells his products in various markets. Jose is requesting a loan to purchase a heifer and thus continue raising livestock to improve his income.

loans.use: to purchase a heifer.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica desde hace 34 años al cultivo de jocote, maíz, frijol y maicillo, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos como: semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder seguir con sus cultivos y asi poder tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Roberto is 62 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and four children. For 34 years he has earned a living growing "jocote" (a local fruit), corn, beans, and sorghum. He sells his products in the various markets near his home. Roberto is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as seeds, fertilizer, manure, and pesticides to improve the soil shown in the photograph and thus improve his income and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, and pesticides to improve the soil.

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov, 50, is a married woman who lives in a rural area of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has six children in total; three are married and three are single. To make a living, she manages and operates a farming business, growing rice and selling the crop to the local dealers. So far, she has been involved in this career for 35 years. She is able to make an income of USD 2.00 per day, on average.  

Currently, she wants to open a clothes store for her child to serve people in her community. However, limited capital doesn't allow her to do so. 

Therefore, she would like to apply for a KIVA loan; she will use this loan as capital to open a clothes store for her child. With the support from this loan, she hopes that her child can get more income and improve the living standard. 

She would like to thank all lenders for their financial support toward poor people.

loans.use: to open a clothes store for her child

loans.name: Orfelinda

texts.es:
Orfelinda tiene 61 años, vive en casa familiar con sus padres en el distrito de Cayaltí, que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pavos, gallinas, patos, entre otros, cuenta con más de 08 años de experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como patos, pavos, gallinas, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos. De esta manera Orfelinda espera satisfacer los gustos y preferencias de sus clientes lo que se verá reflejado en un mayor nivel de ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Orfelinda is 61 years old, lives in the family home with her parents in the Cayalti district, which is in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, northern coast of Peru. She lives in a community that works in commerce, farming and ranching as main sources of income.

She works raising and selling small animals such as ducks, turkeys, hens, etc. She has more than 8 years experience in this business and with regular customers who give her very good personal and work references.

This loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of ducks, turkeys, hens, etc. and also to buy balanced feed to fatten them. This is how Orfelinda hopes to satisfy the likes and preferences of her clients which will be reflected in a greater level of income and will improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase ducks, turkeys, hens, etc. and balanced feed.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell for her buy and sell rice business.

Imelda has been in this business for eight years. She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Imelda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene works hard to support her family. Irene is married, and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Irene requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Irene has been in this business for six years now. She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish

loans.name: Dorotea

texts.en:
Dorotea is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Dorotea is 52 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Dorotea has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 11000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Dorotea has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Chanthol's Group

texts.en: Chanthol’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Chanthol makes a living cultivating rice and she also does work as traditional clothes maker to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of her family and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Saly

texts.en:
Saly is a 43-year-old married rice farmer with six children, who lives in the Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. She has cultivated rice since 2000. Two of her children are factory workers, one is a construction worker and two are in school. Her husband is a 49-year-old construction worker. Together, they can earn approximately 21 USD per day. 

Saly would like to request a loan to buy a cow to fatten and breed in order to have calves to sell. This loan will help her to improve the family’s finances. In the future, she is going to renovate her house and help her children to finish high school.

loans.use: to buy a cow to fatten and breed in order to have calves to sell.

loans.name: Lalina

texts.en:
Lalina works hard to support her family. Lalina is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase sewing supplies such as threads, pins, zippers and fabric.

Lalina has been in this business for 7 years now. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase sewing supplies such as threads, pins, zippers and fabric

loans.name: Maxima

texts.en:
Maxima is a businesswoman who has been widowed for 11 years. She lives in Aloran. She became a microfinance member of PMPC and runs a retail store selling thatched "nipa" for constructing house walls. Running this type of business has supported her family's needs. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase more inventories of "nipa" to be weaved for her business of selling thatched "nipa." Maxima believes that having enough inventory would allow her to cater to her customers' needs. 

She is thankful that she has signed up for membership with PMPC as her financing partner.

loans.use: to purchase more inventories of "nipa" to be weaved.

loans.name: Ángel Gerardo

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito La Dolorosa Del Pechiche.
En este lugar vive don Ángel, tiene 52 años de edad, hace varios años su querida esposa falleció pero de esta  relación tuvo 7 hijos, 4 mayores de edad, los  tres menores  son de 15, 12 y 11 años de edad y  estudian en colegio y escuela, 5 de ellos aun vive con él.
El señor Angel es un hombre que le ha tocado trabajar toda la vida para sacar adelante a su familia, pero ya por su edad se le hace muy difícil trabajar ya que él se dedica a la agricultura y este trabajo es duro y casi no hay trabajo en todo el año es por esta razón que hace  2 años surtió en su casa una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de víveres,  trabaja el con la ayuda de sus hijos, de esta forma el se gana el sustento para él y su familia aunque en la temporada invernal también se dedica a la agricultura.
Este crédito es para  comprar productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda. Está en el Grupo De Crédito hace 3 ciclos y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Los Bajos de Montecristi is a city known for its wide variety of traditional products, such as Panama hats, which are well-known at home and abroad. Here, the partners of the La Dolorosa Del Pechiche Credit Group meet every 15 days. This is the home of Mr. Ángel, who is 52 years old. His beloved wife died several years ago, but he has 7 children: 4 adults and 3 minors (who are 15, 12, and 11 years old and are in school). Five of his children live with him.

Mr. Ángel has had to work all his life to support his family, but, due to his old age, it is becoming difficult for him to keep working. He earns a living as a farmer, which is hard work and hard to come by throughout the year. Because of this, he began selling groceries from his home two years ago. There, he sells all kinds of groceries with the help of his children. In this way, he can support himself and his family, although he also farms during winter. He is requesting this loan to buy food staples to stock his store. He has been a member of the Credit Group for 3 cycles and says that the loans have helped him greatly. His dream is to give his children his best.

loans.use: to buy food staples to stock his store.

loans.name: Florenda

texts.en:
Florenda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business raising pigs in the Philippines.

Florenda requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Florenda has been in this business for three years now, and earns additional income from farming rice.

She would like to save money in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business raising pigs in the Philippines.

Maria requested a 30,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Maria has been in this business for ten years now, and earns additional income from farming rice.

She would like to save enough money to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Malika

texts.en:
Malika is a freshman at the American University of Central Asia, Department of Liberal Arts and Sciences. Here is her story:

“The university tuition fee is like a making an investment for one’s future. As my father says, the more you invest, the more you get in your life. And I believe in it. I entered American University of Central Asia, because AUCA provides an excellent educational background. The course of FYS (First Year Seminar) is very important, since here we start to construct our first academic speeches in English. It is very important for further self-development.

My family consists of six people: my father, my mother, my grandmother, me and my two younger brothers. My grandmother is 83 years old and a pensioner. My mother is on maternity leave and preparing to give birth to my sister. Despite the fact that we are short of money, we are happy to have one more member of our friendly and happy family. My younger brother has health problems and visits a doctor often, and gets special treatment. My youngest brother is in kindergarten, but this year he is to go to school. We live in an unfinished house, which has been under construction for almost for six years and is not finished yet. Unfortunately, our current financial situation will not allow us to finish it soon.

The Kiva loan is a new project in Kyrgyzstan, something unfamiliar for most of our citizens. So I am happy to have a chance to receive one as a student of AUCA. One more time it shows that AUCA has the best partners and it provides modern life conveniences. I really believe that Kiva changes one’s life and I hope that one day I will become a Kiva lender myself.”

loans.use: to pay university tuition fees.

loans.name: Jose Leonidas

texts.es:
Laborioso y soñador, son dos palabras que describen perfectamente a Jose, un hombre trabajador y de familia, que hace lo que este a su alcance para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa.
Se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos en el municipio de Caparrapi.
Esta es una actividad muy común en esta región y gran parte de sus habitantes la practican.
El posee gran conocimiento en esta materia y considera que necesita un pequeño impulso para incrementar sus ventas y aumentar su negocio, es por esta razón que solicita un auxilio económico para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para el mantenimiento del corral donde alberga sus animales.
Con este préstamo podrá continuar con su actividad que es la única fuente de ingresos de su familia.
Se siente agradecido con los prestamistas de Kiva y con la Corporación Interactuar que hacen posible que su negocio crezca y mejore.
texts.en:
Hard-working and a dreamer are two words that describe Jose perfectly. He is a hard-working family man who does everything he can to provide his wife and children with a better quality of living. He works raising and selling pigs in the municipality of Caparrapi. This is a very common activity in this region and a majority of the inhabitants do this.

Jose has great knowledge in this field and he feels that he needs a little boost to increase his sales and expand his business. For this reason he has requested economic help to invest in buying materials to maintain the corral where he keeps his animals.

With this loan he can continue with his work which is the only source of income for his family. He is grateful to the lenders at KIva and with the Interactuar Corporation who make it possible for his business to grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy materials to maintain the corral where he keeps his animals.

loans.name: My

texts.en:
My is a 61-year-old married rice farmer with two children, who lives in the Kampong Chhnang province in Cambodia. For the past 20 years, My has cultivated rice. One of his children is a civil servant and another one attends school. His wife is 66 years old and she earns income from selling herbal medicine. Together, they can make around 14 USD a day. 

My is requesting a loan to buy construction materials to build a ground-floor room. With the loan, he will be able to have more space to live in. My is going to expand his rice farm and also support his child so that they finish high school.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a ground-floor room.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines and supports her two children by building houses from the ground up. She has applied for a loan, which she used to buy building materials and paint, and to pay her workers. 

She wants her children to get an education and escape the life of backbreaking work she has had to endure.

loans.use: to buy building materials and paint, and to pay her workers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to rent a place in a domestic market for her business.

loans.name: Dan  Barney

texts.en:
Dan Barney wants to fulfill his dreams by completing his studies and earning a degree. He religiously pays attention and has made good marks in every semester he entered. For another school year, Dan Barney is in need of a loan to pay for his school fees. 

Dan Barney has big dreams to help his family and for his siblings as well. This is the reason why he works hard for his education.

loans.use: to pay for his school fees.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.en:
Saturnina has prepared considerably for the post harvest operations of her farm products in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She wants to ensure that she will have ample time for the threshing, drying, storage and processing of her harvest to make way for another cropping season. She presented her proposal to Paglaum MPC and made a loan.  

Saturnina hopes to see all her children finish their degrees and have stable careers.

loans.use: to pay for post harvest operations.

loans.name: Musharaf

texts.en:
Musharaf is a strong woman. She was born in 1961. She lives in a village, and is widowed with five children. She is a hardworking, wise, generous and optimist person. 

She started a business buying and selling fruits and vegetables. She has been doing her business for almost three months and she trades in a grocery store. She is planning to expand her business and buy vegetables. 

It is hard for her to earn money and feed her big family. She is asking for financial support to buy vegetables.

loans.use: to buy vegetables in order to expand her business.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is married and has one child. She is 32 years old and lives in Masubong, Sapang Dalaga. She earns a living offering manicure/pedicure services. She now has been in this business for about two years and is well known for the nice quality of services she offers. She has already purchased some new manicure sets and was able to save from it. 

Myrna is seeking a 5,000 PHP loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase special items for her foot spa services. In her previous loans she has never had a delinquency. Myrna is very diligent and loves accuracy, which only adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to purchase items for foot spa services

location.town: Calamba-Sapang Ama Sapang Dalaga Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Myrgelyn

texts.en:
Myrgelyn is 40 years old, married and a resident of Poblacion, La Libertad, Philippines. Her husband is a tricycle driver. They have three children who are in school.  

Starting with capitalization of 1,000 PHP, she opened a sari-sari (general store) and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefits given by the co-op. She became a member in April 2013 and has taken out several loans, all paid in a timely manner. 

Now she is applying for 5,000 PHP to buy additional stock for her sari-sari store, particularly basic commodities. In the future, she wants to own a mini-mart someday, and will be fully satisfied if she sees her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa lives in Sindangan, Philippines. She is married to a fisherman. From her desire to earn income as well, Jesusa raises hogs in their backyard. Since she has been doing this for six years, she is a master at her job. 

Jesusa joined Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative to access insurance and credit. She is hardworking and determined to pursue her goals in order to sustain her needs. 

Jesusa is requesting a loan to purchase an additional piglet, animal feeds, and vitamins. This will greatly help her boost her income. Someday, she hopes to build concrete pigpens to fully engage in running a piggery business. Jesusa has always dreamed to uplift the life condition of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional piglet, animal feeds, and vitamins

loans.name: Adelina

texts.en:
Adelina is 52 years old and married with four children. 

Adelina is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Adelina requested a 26,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Adelina has been in pig fattening for seven years now, and has borrowed 17 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Adelina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Edinson

texts.es:
Edinson es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.
Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo de papa criolla; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de La Union.
Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito con la Corporación Interactuar para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes, abonos y la compra de semillas de café.
El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.
Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Edinson is a humble and hard-working farmer who has the energy and pluck that distinguish the men and women of the countryside. He is a man with an enterprising mind who since he was small learned all the activities in the fields like crops and raising animals.

Today he has his own native potato crop. He sells his product in the plaza of the municipal market in La Union. He has the goal of increasing his crops and improving those he has. So he has requested the assistance of a loan from the Interactuar Corporation to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer and manure and to buy coffee seeds.

The loan will give him the chance to progress as an entrepreneur and as a person and also increase his income and continue to sustain his family. The only thing he wants is to be able to improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like fertilizer, manure and to buy coffee seeds.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is juggling a suman (rice cake) business and supervising the renovation of her home. She hopes to live comfortably with a house that has good roofing, supported by her loan of 50,000 PHP. Fe is thankful to PMPC for helping with the financing needs of her retailing business.

loans.use: to do renovations on her house.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.en:
Gulnora is a composed woman. She was born in 1989. She is from the southern part of the country and lives in a rural area. She is married and has two children. Her husband is an emigrant. 

Gulnora has three years’ experience doing a business. She is a seamstress and sews clothing for women and men. Doing her business, she has gained a lot of clients. She is famous among seamstresses. She has satisfied customers in her domestic market area. 

Gulnora's house is in renovation condition. Finally, she decided to finish the renovations to her house. 

Gulnora has requested financial support for renovating her house.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Leona

texts.en:
Leona works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish nets and materials for boat repairs.

Leona has been in this business for eight years now.

In the future, Leona would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish nets and materials for boat repairs.

loans.name: Rhea

texts.en:
Rhea is 34 years old and married with two children.  With two children in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Rhea runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, canned goods, sugar, bread, etc. Rhea has been in this business for 3 years.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, canned goods, sugar, bread, etc.

loans.name: Elvia De Jesus

texts.es:
Elvia es madre de 2 hijos y vive en unión libre. Aparte de su familia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años. 
Aprendió de este negocio empíricamente, es decir a través de la práctica y la observación de otras personas. 

Ella y su familia viven en zona rural de Tamesis en la cual no es fácil tener acceso a servicios financieros como los que ofrece la Corporación Interactuar. 

Su crédito lo piensa usar en la compra de insumos agropecuarios como semillas de cafe, productos para el control de plagas, y abonos para realizar mantenimiento y sostenimiento a sus cultivos.

Gracias a este crédito, la economía y  calidad de vida de su familia mejoraría pues podrá aumentar sus ingresos. 

Elvia sueña terminar con la legalización de los papeles de su tierra y así tener en pleno el control de sus tierras.

 ¡Impacte la vida de Elvia y su familia con un crédito!
texts.en:
Elvia is the mother of two children and lives with her partner. In addition to taking care of her family, she works in agriculture since 10 years ago. She learned to do the job empirically, that is, through practice and observation of others.

She and her family live in the rural area of Tamesis, where access to financial services like those offered by Interactuar Corporation is not easy.

She will use the loan to buy agricultural supplies such as coffee beans, products for pest control and fertilizers to perform maintenance on her crops.

Thanks to this loan, she will be able to increase her income and hence her family's finances and living conditions will improve.

Elvia dreams of finishing the paperwork for her land and thus take full control of it.

Make a difference in Elvia and her family's life with a loan!

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as coffee beans, products for pest control and fertilizers to perform maintenance on her crops.

loans.name: Vertila

texts.en: Vertila, 40, is married with three adult-age children. Her major source of income is buying and selling grocery items. She has been in this business for four years. The business helps her meet her family's financial needs, especially the education of her children, of whom two are in college. She is still continuing the business because it provides good income due to her loyal customers. Someday, she will have a legacy to leave to her children. Her plan is to maintain her inventory so that her customers will be served well. She is planning for a business expansion for the good of her family. She is applying for a loan to purchase additional inventory for her store.

loans.use: To purchase additional grocery items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Madis

texts.en:
Madis is 62 years old and lives in Poblacion, Sibutad, ZDN. She is a widow and has five children.

Madis has knowledge of the sewing business and earns approximately 2,000 PHP each month doing this work.

She has requested a loan to buy cloth for curtains and pillows for her business. Madis has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Madis hopes to have her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy additional cloth for curtains and pillows

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is married and a mother of two small children. Her husband has worked as a driver since they get married.

Jocelyn is now planning to renovate her house, and she asked for a loan to purchase bags of cement, sand and gravel. The income of her husband shall be used to pay off the loan she has had requested from PMPC.

Jocelyn deeply wishes to maintain her membership in good standing so that she may always run for any financing need in the future.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement, sand and gravel for house renovation

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza is a businesswoman who earns through retailing various items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance.

Recently she applied for a loan to purchase additional bags of cement for house-walling finishing touches. She is on her way to finishing her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional bags of cement for her house

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 48 years old and married with four children. She earns a living through a pig fattening business she has been running for 10 years. She earns additional income from raising corn.

Cecilia is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Diana Estefany

texts.es:
Diana, de 22 años de edad, estudió diplomado en informática, está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en una tienda de consumo y actualmente no tienen hijos.

Diana, se dedica a su pequeño negocio de accesorios de acero inoxidable, realiza este negocio desde hace un año, lo inicio con el propósito de ayudarle a su pareja en los gastos de la casa y ahorrar un poco para que en  un futuro cuando tengan hijos puedan darles lo que necesiten.

Diana, necesita el préstamo para comprar más accesorios de acero como:anillos, pulseras, aretes y otros productos para ofrecerles más variedad a sus clientes y obtener mejores beneficios.
 
El sueño de Diana es, ayudarle a su pareja para que también se involucre en el negocio.
texts.en: Diana is 22 years old. She studied computers. She has a domestic partner, who works at a general store. Currently, they have no children. Diana has a business selling stainless steel accessories. She has had this business for a year. She started it in order to help her partner with household expenses and to save a little so that in the future, when they have children, they can give them what they need. Diana needs the loan to buy more steel accessories such as: rings, bracelets, earrings, and other products to offer her customers more variety and to obtain better benefits. Diana's dream is to help her partner so that he also gets involved in the business.

loans.use: to buy more steel accessories such as: rings, bracelets and other products to offer more variety to her customers.

loans.name: Muyassar

texts.en:
Muyassar is a hardworking woman. She was born in a rural area, and she is living in a village. She is married and has two children. Her husband is a worker in a factory.
